title: Detective Conan: Happy New Year Special
original_name: 名探偵コナン 特別編 「謹賀新年 毛利小五郎」
ending_song: "Kimi e no Uso (君への嘘)" by VALSHE
sinopse: Special episode consisting of two short stories. The first being an expanded version of Detective Conan: The Fugitive Kogorou Mouri, which was never aired on TV till now. The second half being a brand new New Years Day segment.
